title: Bug 7752: Export multiple files with same file name under different directories to zip file fails
description: Steps to reproduce: 1. In the "Export" dialog window, select both projects created earlier. 2. Give the zip file a name (such as test.zip) and begin exporting to a zip file.
OB: When exporting multiple files with the same name under different directories to a zip file, an error message box pops up stating that problems were encountered during export. The detail lists the file of the same name in project2 as the problem (e.g., 'foo.txt' in project 2).
EB: The zip file should be able to store files with the same name under different directories without any issues.
SR: 1. Open the "Export" dialog window. 2. Select both projects. 3. Provide a name for the zip file. 4. Export the files to a zip file. 5. Verify that no error message appears and the zip file is successfully created with all files included.
